title: SetBACnetBitStringProperty (Method)
text:
METHOD SetBACnetBitStringProperty
Sets the BIT STRING value of the specified Property (propID) of this BACnet-Object using a STRING (in form of i.e. â1010111â).
The used functions are no client, meaning, that the access of the property is not restricted by write or read access restrictions.

rows.Name: propID
rows.Comment: The ID of the property to set.

rows:
The length of the bit string to set (has to match the
string).
